name: Buckeye Union Insurance Company, Appellant, v. Murhammer et al

judges: Before Jones, C. J., Eagen, O’Brien, Pomeroy, Nix and Manderino, JJ.
Mr. Justice Roberts took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: Buckeye Union Insurance Company, Appellant, v. Murhammer et al.

opinions.text:
Opinion
per Curiam,
Decree affirmed.
Cost to be borne by Appellant.
Mr. Chief Justice Jones dissents.
Mr. Justice Roberts took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: per Curiam,

attorneys: Harry J. Zimmer, with him Meyer, Darragh, Buckler, Bebenek and Eck, for appellant.
William G. Boyle, with him William P. Getty and Meyer, Unkovic & Scott, for appellees.
casebody.head_matter:
Buckeye Union Insurance Company, Appellant, v. Murhammer et al.
Argued September 27, 1973.
Before Jones, C. J., Eagen, O’Brien, Pomeroy, Nix and Manderino, JJ.
Harry J. Zimmer, with him Meyer, Darragh, Buckler, Bebenek and Eck, for appellant.
William G. Boyle, with him William P. Getty and Meyer, Unkovic & Scott, for appellees.
November 26, 1973:
